cause.description:
Madeleine McCann was born 4 years ago. She has one brother Sean and a sister Amelie. She lives with her family in Rothley, Leicestershire.
Madeleine was snatched from the Algarve resort town of Praia da while the McCann family was on holiday. Madeleine was taken and her two siblings were left where they were in the flat.
The parents of Madeleine were at a nearby restaurant on the hotel complex checking in every 15-30 min with the kids.
Madeleine has a 'leaky' pupil which has 'leaked' into her Iris giving her a highly identifiable look.
At the time of her Kidnapping she had blond hair and is 2-feet-11-inches tall. It is Suspected that her hair may have been dyed and cut in an attempt to hide her.
As Portugal was closed off two days later Madeleine could be anywhere on the globe.
you can call these numbers with any information about Madeleine's whereabouts.
Portuguese Police on 00351 282 405 400 Crime stoppers on 0800 555 111
Also view this site
http://www.findmadeleine.com/
Please donate Via this site as then it goes straight to the search for Madeleine fund and not some random American one. (only American Charity's can be donated to at the moment for some reason through FB)
,
1. Return Madeleine to her parents.
2. Encourage eyewitnesses to come forward.
3. Keep Madeleine in the public eye.
cause.mission: Spread images of Madeline & keep her story in the public eye leading to her rescue and return to her family.
cause.name: Find Madeline Mccann
